it.uniba.game.board

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.game.board.ChessBoard

  • public final class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the chessboard
    Class type : < Entity >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows :
    • The squares of the field
    Does :
    • Instantiates a ChessBoard
    • Sets a move on the ChessBoard
    • Gets a square, with the polar coordinates
    • Converts to string the ChessBoard
    Author:
    LeCun group
